content.introduction: Docker is a platform for developing, shipping, and running applications in containers...

sections.title: Basic Commands
sections.content: Essential Docker commands for managing containers...

code.example:
# Pull an image
docker pull node:latest

# Run a container
docker run -d -p 3000:3000 --name my-app node:latest

# List running containers
docker ps

# Stop a container
docker stop my-app

# Remove a container
docker rm my-app
